{{zh-wp|zh:尊|en:Zun}}

subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|酋|t1=vinegar|寸|t2=hand|ls=ic}} – to give {{zh-l|寸}} an offering {{zh-l|酋}} – to show respect, veneration.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[respect]]; to [[revere]]; to [[venerate]]
# to [[honor#Verb|honor]]
# ancient [[wine]] [[vessel]] made of [[bronze]]

subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=i}}

Nominalization of classical adjective {{m|ja|高し|tr=takashi}}, modern {{m|ja|高い|tr=takai||[[high]]}}.
